Package com.atlan.cache

Class OffHeapAssetCache

java.lang.Object
com.atlan.cache.OffHeapAssetCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class OffHeapAssetCache extends Object
Generic class through which to cache any assets efficiently, off-heap, to avoid risking extreme memory usage.

  • Constructor Details

    • OffHeapAssetCache

      public OffHeapAssetCache(String name, int anticipatedSize)
      Construct new asset cache.
      Parameters:
      name - must be unique across the running code
      anticipatedSize - number of entries we expect to put in the cache

    • OffHeapAssetCache

      public OffHeapAssetCache(String name, int anticipatedSize, Asset exemplar)
      Construct new asset cache.
      Parameters:
      name - must be unique across the running code
      anticipatedSize - number of entries we expect to put in the cache
      exemplar - sample asset value for what will be stored in the cache

  • Method Details

    • add

      public Asset add(Asset asset)
      Add an asset into the cache. Note: the object MUST have a real (not a placeholder) UUID to be cached.
      Parameters:
      asset - to add to the cache
      Returns:
      any asset that was previously cached with the same UUID, or null if no such UUID has ever been cached

    • copy

      public OffHeapAssetCache copy()
      Create a copy of this cache and return it.
      Returns:
      a copy of this cache

    • combinedWith

      public OffHeapAssetCache combinedWith(OffHeapAssetCache other) throws IOException
      Combine two caches together to form a single, new cache. Note: the original caches will be closed and deleted after the combined cache is created.
      Parameters:
      other - other cache with which to combine this one
      Returns:
      a new cache with the combined entries of the original cache and the one provided
      Throws:
      IOException - if unable to clean up either of the original caches

    • extendedWith

      public void extendedWith(OffHeapAssetCache other)
      Extend this cache with all the entries from the provided cache.
      Parameters:
      other - other cache with which to extend this one

    • extendedWith

      public void extendedWith(OffHeapAssetCache other, Predicate<Asset> isValid)
      Extend this cache with all the entries from the provided cache.
      Parameters:
      other - other cache with which to extend this one
      isValid - boolean method that takes a single asset as an argument, and only when evaluated to true for an asset in the other cache will that entry from the other cache be included in this one

    • get

      public Asset get(String id)
      Retrieve an object from the cache by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - of the object to retrieve
      Returns:
      the object with that UUID, or null if it is not in the cache

    • put

      protected Asset put(String id, Asset object)
      Put an object into the cache by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - of the object to put into the cache
      object - to put into the cache
      Returns:
      any object that was previously cached with the same UUID, or null if no such UUID has ever been cached

    • containsKey

      public boolean containsKey(String id)
      Check whether the cache has an object in it with the provided UUID.
      Parameters:
      id - of the object to check exists in the cache
      Returns:
      true if and only if the cache has an object with this UUID in it

    • size

      public int size()
      Retrieve the number of objects currently held in the cache.
      Returns:
      the number of objects currently in the cache

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Retrieve the number of objects currently held in the cache.
      Returns:
      the number of objects currently in the cache

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Indicates whether the cache has no entries.
      Returns:
      true if the cache has no entries, otherwise false

    • isNotEmpty

      public boolean isNotEmpty()
      Indicates whether the cache has any entries.
      Returns:
      true if the cache has at least one entry, otherwise false

    • keys

      public Collection<UUID> keys()
      Retrieve all the keys held in the cache.
      Returns:
      a collection of all keys held in the cache

    • values

      public Collection<Asset> values()
      Retrieve all the objects held in the cache.
      Returns:
      a collection of all objects held in the cache

    • isNotClosed

      public boolean isNotClosed()
      Indicates whether the cache has already been closed.
      Returns:
      true if the cache has been closed, otherwise false

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Clean up the cache, once it is no longer needed.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
      Throws:
      IOException - if unable to remove the temporary file holding the cache
